# Simple CV Builder

> Free CV builder UK with job application tracking and AI cover letters. Build your CV online, share a link, export PDFs. For job seekers and recruitment agencies.

Simple CV Builder helps users create professional CVs, track job applications, and generate AI-powered cover letters. Users get a shareable CV link (e.g. simple-cv-builder.com/cv/username), PDF export, CV templates, and job tracking in one place. Free tier available; premium templates and features via subscription.

- AI Cover Letters: Generate tailored cover letters from job descriptions.

## FAQ (Key Questions)

**What is Simple CV Builder?** Online platform for creating professional CVs that update in real-time and can be shared as a link. For individuals and organisations. Includes job application tracking.

**Is it free?** Yes. Free plan with basic CV, shareable link, PDF export. Pro for unlimited sections, premium templates.

**How do I create my CV?** Register, fill profile and sections (work experience, education, skills, etc.). CV updates in real-time.

**Job application tracker?** Built-in. Track applications, status, follow-ups, notes, files. Available on free plan.

**Contact support?** noreply@simple-job-tracker.com. Priority support for Pro.

## Keywords & ATS Guide (Summary)

**What is ATS?** Applicant Tracking System—software that filters job applications. Up to 75% of CVs rejected by ATS before human review.

**How ATS works:** Parses CV into structured fields. Matches keywords against job description. Ranks and filters. Use standard headings (Work Experience, Education). Include relevant keywords naturally.

**Finding keywords:** Analyse job description for required skills, qualifications, tools, terminology. Use employer's language. Integrate keywords into work experience and summary, not just skills list.
